name: Diet Whey 2kg
description:
Diet Whey is designed to help with weight loss and low carbs and a blend of green tea and L-Carnitine.

Diet Whey is rapidly absorbed, making the protein available for muscle building more quickly, and allowing the amino acids to be taken up by the muscles more quickly.

In addition, whey assists in opening the blood flow during exercise. The flow of nutrients to the muscles is increased, allowing a faster rate of muscle repair.

Diet Whey is an optimum blend of:

• Pure Whey Concentrate, Isolate, Hydrolysed.
• Green Tea, L-Carnitine.

This unique blend provides high levels of all Amino Acid fractions including L-Glutamine and BCAA’s.
Now comes in 4 flavours!!

Chocolate, Strawberry, Banana and Vanilla!

name: Mass Gainer 2.25KG
description:
The  Mass Gainer is a potent formula specifically designed to provide the  optimum level of high quality calories, ideal for lean muscle growth,  endurance, and high impact activities.   As well as supplying all the  critical nutrients for supporting fast muscle growth, we believe that,  gram for gram, BFN’s Mass Gainer is the most calorie concentrated  weight gainer on the market today.
Each serving provides a hefty 1000 calorie punch without giving you that bloated, overly full feeling.
Ingredients:  Low Lactose Pure Whey Protein Concentrate, Hydrolysed whey Protein.  Whole milk Protein, Maltodextrin, Dextrose Monohydrate, Pure Micronised  Oat flour, Fructose, Soya Protein Isolate, Barley Malt.  Amino acid,  peptides (from Peptabond®). MCTs and EFAs, Natural and Natural Identical  Flavouring, Natural colourings, Stabilisers (Citric acid, Malic acid),  Di Sodium Phosphate, Texturisers: Acacia gum, Xanthan Gum. Contains  Sweetener: Sucralose®.

Mass  Gainer is a precise blend of quality proteins combined with complex  carbohydrates together with high glycaemic fast acting carbohydrates for  rapid glycogen replenishment.
Extreme Lean Mass Gainer is a  premium quality protein and carbohydrate formula to help you add high  quality calories to you daily diet.

name: Natural Performance Meals
description:
Mexican-Style Lean Beef 

Tender Beef Mince With Red Kidney Beans and Whole Grain Brown Rice in a Mexican Style Sauce.

Ingredients: Beef (40%), Tomatoes, Red Kidney Beans (14%), Cooked Whole Grain Brown Rice (12%), Red Peppers, Tomato Puree, Spices, Garlic Puree, Cornflour, Himalyan Crystal Salt.

Thai Style Chicken With Brown Rice

Tender Pieces Of Chicken Breast And Whole Grain Brown Rice In a Thai Style Brown Rice

Cooked Chicken Breast (41%), Reconstituted Coconut Milk Powder (21%)(contains Milk), Red Peppers (13%), Cooked Whole Grain Brown Rice (13%), Water Chestnuts (3%), Cornflour, Green Thai Curry Paste (Green Jalapeno, Lemongrass, Sunflower Oil, Water, Herb, Spices, Red Pepper, Garlic, Salt, Red Chillies, Lime Juice Concentrate), Ginger Puree, Chilli Puree, Garlic Puree, Lemongrass, Coriander, Olive Oil, Lime Leaves, Himalayan Crystal Salt.

Moroccan -Style Chicken With Quinoa

Tender Pieces of Chicken Breast With Quinoa In Spinach And Mango Sauce

Cooked Chicken Breast (45%), Mango Juice from Concentrate(30%), Quinoa (10%), Spinach (4%), Red Peppers, Cornflour, Ginger Puree (1%), Coriander, Himalyan Crystal Salt.

Indian Style Beef With Red Lentils 

Tender Beef Mince and Red Lentils In A Rogan Josh Style Sauce

Beef (40%), Tomatoes (20%), Water, Onion (10%), Split Red Lentils (8%), Tomato Puree, Cornflour, Rapeseed Oil, Spices, Ginger Puree, Garlic Puree, Himalayan Crystal Salt, Chilli Puree.

options.name: 1x Tender Beef Mince and Red Lentils In A Rogan Josh Style Sauce
1x Thai Style Chicken With Brown Rice

name: Metabolic Fuel 1.2kg
description:
BFN nutrition’s Metabolic Fuel is a revolutionary recovery supplement which reduces muscle fatigue and Increases aerobic and/or anaerobic work output performance. It employs the latest research to provide your body with the essential nutrients necessary for effective recovery. The unique ingredient combination is designed to help promote and speed up the recovery whilst burning fat to fuel much longer and harder training sessions enhancing muscle development.

Berry Flavour

Maltodextrine, Hydrolysed Waxy Maize Starch, Dextrose, L-Carnitine L-Tartrate Powder, L-Arginine Aspartate, Trisodium Citrate, Citric Acid Anhydrous Fine, Flavouring (Orange), Potassium Chloride, Calcium Carbonate, Magnesium Carbonate, Stabiliser (Xanthan Gum), Natural Colour (Beta Carotene), Sweetener (Sucralose), Sodium Chloride

Orange Flavour

Maltodextrine, Hydrolysed Waxy Maize Starch, Dextrose, L-Carnitine L-Tartrate Powder, L-Arginine Aspartate, Trisodium Citrate, Citric Acid Anhydrous Fine, Flavouring (Orange), Potassium Chloride, Calcium Carbonate, Magnesium Carbonate, Stabiliser (Xanthan Gum), Natural Colour (Beta Carotene), Sweetener (Sucralose), Sodium Chloride

name: Slimming Pack
description:
BFN’s new ultimate fat loss slimming pack – Contains Acai Berry, Green Tea, Raspberry Ketones, CLA.

BFN’s new slimming pack is here, the carefully selected tablets are designed to give you a ultimate fat loss program.

The slimming Pack contains 28 individual sachets which have 4 different tablets contained within, one satchet is to be taken everyday, therefore giving you 4 weeks supply.

The pack contains:

    Green Tea ( which is many times stronger than cup of green tea)
    Acai Berry (powerful antioxidant plus weight loss benefits)
    Raspberry Ketones (Raspberry ketone also has naturally occurring thermogenic properties)
    CLA (Conjugated linoleic acid might help reduce body fat deposits and improve immune function)

The tablets are designed to help speed up your metabolism,which will cause you to burn fat. This pack is a must in a diet design to lose weight,all you need is to take one sachet daily. Theres no messing about with 4 or 5 different tablet bottles just one simple sachet per day.
